page.title: 02Local Life
page.content:
Houses:The houses near our school are mostly detached or semi-detached. There are no terrace houses or blocks of flats near our school, but there are new flats on the Brighton Road. Most of the houses near our school are at least 50 years old. Many have new roofs and garages, plus large gardens. Travelling To School:Most children take over 20 minutes to get to school;some take 5-10 minutes. Most children walk or take the bus;others by train or car. Leisure:The possible leisure activities are the cinema, local youth clubs and playing sport on the Purley Way recreation fields.
By Paul Emecz Thomas More School
